title: United States Crude Oil Production
description: Crude Oil Production in the United States increased to 11975 BBL/D/1K in August from 11800 BBL/D/1K in July of 2022. Crude Oil Production in the United States averaged 7643.54 BBL/D/1K from 1950 until 2022, reaching an all time high of 12860 BBL/D/1K in November of 2019 and a record low of 3974 BBL/D/1K in September of 2008. This page provides the latest reported value for - United States Crude Oil Production - plus previous releases, historical high and low, short-term forecast and long-term prediction, economic calendar, survey consensus and news.
author: U.S. Energy Information Administration
